text: Formigny La Bataille is a commune. It is found in the region Normandy in the Calvados department in the northwest of France. The municipality was created on 1 January 2017 and consists of the former communes of Formigny (the seat), Aignerville, Écrammeville and Louvières.Arrêté préfectoral 8 September 2016 == References == Category:2017 establishments in France Category:Communes in Calvados
title: Formigny La Bataille
